ShortDescription.Value: This mod allows you to configure the age that cims move from one life stage to the other.

Publish.LongDescription:
This mod has a few options to configure the age that cims move from one life stage to the other. It also has options to configure their education.
## Age Settings
This setting menu allows you to configure some age settings:
* **Child School Start Age:** The age that children will start going to Elementary School. * **Child Age Limit:** The age that children will become teenagers. * **Teen Age Limit:** The age that teenagers will become adults. * **Adult Retirement Age:** The age that adults will retire and become elderly. * **Female Life Expectancy:** The average age that women are likely to die. * **Male Life Expectancy:** The average age that men are likely to die.
## Education Settings
This section has a few options to configure education:
* **Number of years in College:** The number of years that cims will stay in College. * **Number of years in University:** The number of years that cims will stay in University. * **Elementary School Graduation Probability:** The probability that a citizen will graduate elementary school. * **High School Graduation Probability:** The probability that a citizen will graduate high school. * **College Graduation Probability:** The probability that a citizen will graduate college. * **University Graduation Probability:** The probability that a citizen will graduate university. * **Entering High School Probability:** The probability that a citizen will enter High School. * **Adult Entering High School Probability:** The probability that an adult will enter High School. * **Worker Continue Education Probability:** The probability that a worker will continue their education.
**WARNING:** Using this mod in an existing city may cause a death wave.
